Posted on Apr 15, 19:06 EDT Past Incidents Apr 17, 2020 No incidents reported today. Apr 16, 2020 No incidents reported. Apr 15, 2020 No incidents reported. Apr 14, 2020 No incidents reported. Apr 13, 2020 No incidents reported. Apr 12, 2020 No incidents reported. Apr 11, 2020 No incidents reported. Apr 10, 2020 Incident Alerted Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Apr 10, 13:12 EDT Monitoring - Looks like we've recovered from a brief network interruption and presence changes are working as expected. We'll continue to monitor and update here if necessary. Apr 10, 12:30 EDT Update - We've had several reports of issues with agents setting online, offline, and away. We're investigating the cause of this issue and will update as soon as we know more. Apr 10, 12:04 EDT Investigating - We've detected an issue and are working to resolve this quickly. We'll have an update within the hour. Apr 10, 11:56 EDT Apr 9, 2020 Transcripts sometimes failing to send to CRMs and other integrations Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Apr 9, 15:06 EDT Monitoring - We've released a fix for this issue and transcripts appear to be arriving at the endpoints as expected. We'll keep a close watch on this and update here as necessary. Apr 9, 12:50 EDT Investigating - We're investigating reports that transcripts are intermittently failing to send to CRMs and other integrations. We'll update here as soon as we know more. Apr 9, 11:57 EDT Apr 8, 2020 No incidents reported. Apr 7, 2020 No incidents reported. Apr 6, 2020 No incidents reported. Apr 5, 2020 No incidents reported. Apr 4, 2020 No incidents reported. Past Incidents Apr 24, 2020 No incidents reported today. Apr 23, 2020 No incidents reported. Apr 22, 2020 Incident Alerted Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Apr 22, 15:37 EDT Monitoring - We have implemented a fix for the issue that was preventing agents from logging into the agent chat console at chat.olark.com. Please give your browser a refresh before logging in to chat. Apr 22, 13:51 EDT Identified - We've identified the cause of the issue that's keeping users from connecting to the agent console. We're working on resolution now, in the meantime, clearing your browser cookies and refreshing your browser should resolve the issue for individual users. Apr 22, 11:00 EDT Update - We're investigating an issue users are seeing when trying to log in to the agent console (chat.olark.com). We'll update here as soon as possible. Apr 22, 10:37 EDT Investigating - We've detected an issue and are working to resolve this quickly. We'll have an update within the hour. Apr 22, 10:19 EDT Apr 21, 2020 System Maintenance Window Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed. Apr 21, 22:28 EDT In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary. Apr 21, 22:00 EDT Scheduled - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this window. Interruptions to chat could occur during this time. Apr 15, 19:06 EDT Agents intermittently being disconnected from the agent console Resolved - We have identified the issue and have put out a fix. Agents should not be seeing any disconnects or reconnects any longer. Apr 21, 22:27 EDT Identified - We've received reports of some agents being disconnected and reconnected from the agent console (chat.olark.com) We're working on resolution now and will update here as things change. Apr 15, 2021 Olark Native for iOS performance issue Resolved - Our service provider has released a fix and we believe the issues we were seeing have been resolved. Apr 15, 10:55 EDT Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue. Apr 14, 19:32 EDT Investigating - Our native mobile app (currently in BETA) for iOS users is currently experiencing issues with notifications and status changes. We've determined this issue to be caused by a technical problem with our messaging provider. We are working with this provider to resolve this issue as quickly as possible. Some affected functionality includes: unread message badges, desktop/mobile status changes, and desktop/mobile interactions. Chat messages between visitors and agents are still being delivered properly but you may wish to use an alternate chat console (such as chat.olark.com) until this issue can be resolved. We'll update here as we have additional information. Apr 14, 18:33 EDT Apr 14, 2021 Apr 13, 2021 No incidents reported. Apr 12, 2021 No incidents reported. Apr 11, 2021 No incidents reported.
